Is there a way to create a CuArray with a constant value in a way that can go inside a function that ends up passing through Zygote? This eg does not work (CUDA v2.6.1, Zygote v0.6.3; stack trace in thread):
```gradient(A -> sum(A * fill!(CuArray{Float32}(undef, 10), 2)), 2)```
This does work for `Array`. Also any chance this is a regression in CUDA? I have some code that did this that I feel like used to work, although I don't have it bisected carefully so I could be wrong.
